faq.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Get answers to your questions about frame rate conversion with WaveSpeed AI

items.title: What is frame rate conversion?
items.description: Frame rate conversion is the process of changing the speed of a video by adjusting the number of frames displayed per second, enhancing smoothness and playback quality.

items.title: Is there a limit to video length?
items.description: Yes! Each user can convert videos up to 30 minutes long using the free service. Longer videos can be processed with a subscription.

items.title: Can I use converted videos for commercial projects?
items.description: Absolutely! All converted content can be used commercially as long as you’re subscribed.

items.title: How secure is my video during the conversion?
items.description: Your videos are processed directly in your browser, ensuring privacy and security. Once the browser is closed, all data is cleared.

footer.heading: Ready to Transform Your Videos?
footer.description: Try WaveSpeed AI now and experience smoother playback. No registration needed.
